full_summary:
### 2061550 - Request for Proposal: Liquid Runway De-Icing/Anti-Icing Compounds
#### Solicitation Number: WS4148100952
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Publication Date: September 20, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: October 6, 2023, 2:00 pm (Eastern Daylight Time)
#### Expected Contract Start Date: None
#### Expected Contract End Date: December 29, 2023

Transport Canada is soliciting proposals to supply and deliver liquid runway de-icing/anti-icing compounds (potassium acetate) for airfield pavements at Port Hardy Airport.

**Overview**
The Canadian government has exercised the utility of commercial cooperation with the Republic of Korea and Canada has made commitments to promote trade under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement and Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

**Objective**
The objective of this contract is to provide liquid de-icer for airfield pavements at Port Hardy Airport. This requires submitting a bid that meets the technical requirements and stands out from competitors through fair and reasonable pricing.

**Prerequisites**
* Goods and Services Insurance binding contracts shall be in place prior to proceeding with work execution.
* Workforce to be deployed on the job site must meet local industry standards.

**Proposals Submission**
The formal bid package was made available on the Government of Canada's online tendering system, Truth. For more information visit [Proposal Package WS4148100952](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17505243?extsite=MTc1MDUyNDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==?ut=1cplxabbhnrbsb09nv33szkr37zylalbxbsvhb)

For questions or concerns regarding the tender, please reach out to Stein, Shaylan, the Engineer, on 1-877-227-1677 from 8:30am EST to 4:00pm EST, Monday to Friday.
